parameters.query:
INSERT INTO user_limits (user_id, limit_type, limit_value, reset_at)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
ON CONFLICT (user_id, limit_type) DO UPDATE SET
  limit_value = EXCLUDED.limit_value,
  reset_at = EXCLUDED.reset_at,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, user_id, limit_type, limit_value, reset_at;
